column4: I am trying to reinstall grub after a windows install and am getting this error - http://www.pastebin.org/1198 can anyone help?
i normally install grub to the mbr of the hard drive.. ie: /dev/sda  NOT /dev/sda5
well that makes sense. let me try that
you may want to reread the '!fixgrub' factoid/urls also.. and the grub docs Its worth learning the ins and outs of grub
